Complete Basement Solutions

One Contractor, All Your Basement Needs

Most contractors do one thing. We handle everything basement-related under one roof. Whether you need waterproofing, underpinning, or aren't sure - we'll help you understand your options and make informed decisions.

Stop leaks, eliminate moisture, protect your foundation. Interior systems, exterior solutions, crack repair, and drainage improvements.

The Consultation Process

Understanding Your Needs

⏱️ Fixed Timelines, Real Results
  • 01

    Free Inspection & Assessment

    Every project starts with listening. What are your basement goals? During consultation, we inspect inside and outside thoroughly, identify all existing issues, and discuss your plans. No sales pressure - just straightforward advice about what your basement needs.

  • 02

    Clear Solutions & Transparent Pricing

    We explain viable options clearly and provide detailed written estimates. Our quotes include clear pricing and note any factors that could affect final cost. The right solution depends on your specific situation, goals, and budget.

  • 03

    Professional Execution & Warranty

    Most waterproofing completes within a week. Underpinning typically finishes in under 5 weeks. We explain the work, stick to timelines, and keep disruption minimal. All work backed by comprehensive warranties.

Why Toronto Homeowners Choose Us

One Contractor, Complete Solutions

Most contractors do one thing. Waterproofers waterproof. Underpinners underpin. When you need both - or aren't sure what you need - you're stuck coordinating multiple trades. We handle everything basement-related under one roof.

This matters because basement problems are often interconnected. That crack letting water in? It might indicate foundation settlement. Planning to underpin for a rental suite? You'll need proper waterproofing too. We see the complete picture and address all issues correctly.

  • Fixed timelines - waterproofing in a week, underpinning in 5 weeks
  • Local expertise in every Toronto neighborhood
  • Comprehensive warranties on all work
  • Licensed, insured, and bonded
Get Your Free Consultation
Since 2014
Licensed
Insured
Protecting Your Investment

Smart Investment Protection

Your home represents security - financial and personal. Basement problems threaten both. Water damage compounds quickly. Unusable space wastes potential. Foundation issues worsen over time. Professional basement work isn't an expense - it's protection. Whether waterproofing to prevent damage or underpinning to create income, you're investing in your home's future.
